### Mac

ggplot2: 

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# 在最後加上
p + theme(text = element_text(family = "STHeiti"))

# 若有用到 geom_text 則要在裡面加 family = "STHeiti"
geom_text(family = "STHeiti")
```

輸出:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
ggsave(device = "png", type = "cairo")`
```
